GL.Octree Class

Defined in: ../src/octree.js:5

Octree generator for fast ray triangle collision with meshes Dependencies: glmatrix.js (for vector and matrix operations)

Boolean

Defined in ../src/octree.js:263

    sphere center

  • radius Number

Returns:
